title.html: FULL DAY UBUD AND ULUWATU TOUR

tagline.title: FULL DAY UBUD AND ULUWATU TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR EXPLORE TOURISM SITE IN UBUD VILLAGE AND SEE THE AMAZING VIEW SUNSET AT ULUWATU TEMPLE
tagline.text: FULL DAY UBUD AND ULUWATU TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR EXPLORE TOURISM SITE IN UBUD VILLAGE AND SEE THE AMAZING VIEW SUNSET AT ULUWATU TEMPLE
tagline.html: FULL DAY UBUD AND ULUWATU TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR EXPLORE TOURISM SITE IN UBUD VILLAGE AND SEE THE AMAZING VIEW SUNSET AT ULUWATU TEMPLE

description.text: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour is a Bali Full Day Tour Packages to visit tourist destinations in Ubud village such as Tegenungan waterfall, Tegalalang rice terrace, Ubud monkey forest and then continue visiting tourist destinations in Uluwatu, namely Uluwatu temple and Kecak dance performances. A one day tour that we designed for those of you who want to visit Ubud and Uluwatu villages in one day. The first tourist destination we will visit is the Ubud monkey forest, which is a natural tourist destination to see the beauty of a small forest inhabited by monkeys and a very interesting forest design. Continue to the Tegalalang Rice Terrace to see views of the rice fields with terraces often very beautiful. very beautiful, continue to Tegenungan waterfall to see the waterfall tourist attraction in Ubud and it is one of the very popular tourist destinations in Ubud, we see the view of the waterfall from the view point, Continue to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with delicious Indonesian food. After lunch, continue the journey to Uluwatu Temple. This journey is quite long, because the distance from Ubud to Uluwatu is very far. Arriving at Uluwatu, we will go around the temple to see the beauty of this temple which is sacred to Hindus, and see the view of the sunset here with the expanse of the ocean which is so beautiful, continue to the small theater to watch the very famous Kecak and fire dances, with the music produced by the dancers will make the viewing atmosphere not boring , after that we will go to where you are staying with a very impressive experience on a One Day Trip to Ubud Village and Uluwatu Temple, accompanied by a professional and friendly tour driver will make one day to Ubud and Uluwatu very enjoyable

title.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest

image.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Monkey Forest is a tourist destination in Ubud village which is very popular among tourists, where we will visit a small forest that is still natural and see the habitat of local monkeys which are very tame, apart from the small forest, there is also a temple shrine which is sanctified by local residents. Monkey Forests in Balinese language called Wanara Wana are spread out on the island and Ubud Monkey Forest itself has a very important function of the continuity of the monkey habitat in Bali. Meanwhile the local community owns important role to keep this forest naturally in order so that all wild animals are able to live smoothly. It is important to treat the monkeys with respect as this forest is their home and you are a guest in it. Please remain on the paved paths, each corner will be guard by staff here to makesure nothing happen to visitor

title.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Tegalalang Rice Terrace

image.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Ubud Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is a tourist destination to see views of rice fields with very beautiful terraces, located in northern Ubud with a cool and natural atmosphere, making the view even more impressive. The rows of coconut trees in the rice fields make the view even more beautiful to look at, the rice fields follow the seasons, namely planting season, rejuvenation season and harvest season, if you are lucky you can see when the rice is still green in the rejuvenation season. Apart from that, there are many photo spots here with a stunning rice terrace as a backdrop, with a very strategic location making this place never empty of tourists. The Tegallalang rice terrace is designed very beautifully with exquisite hollowing rice fields and precisely located on the hill bank.
description.html: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is a tourist destination to see views of rice fields with very beautiful terraces, located in northern Ubud with a cool and natural atmosphere, making the view even more impressive. title.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Tegenungan Waterfall

image.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Ubud Tegenungan Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegenungan Waterfall is a natural tourist destination to see the beauty of the waterfall in Ubud village which is still natural and the cool air will make the visit even more enjoyable. The location of Tegenungan waterfall is very strategic and easy to access, making Tegenungan waterfall one of the most popular tourist destinations in Ubud village. This tour is a sightseeing tour, that is, we will only see the view of Tegenungan waterfall from the view point above, and if you want to go down, make sure you have very good stamina, because you will go down 150 steps. Typical scene around Tegenungan Waterfall is truly delightful, with green trees and beautiful. Near to the waterfall has been produced with a couple of showers from normal springs. The charm of this Tegenungan waterfall always makes those who see it click amazed

title.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Uluwatu Temple

image.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Uluwatu Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Uluwatu Temple is a religious tourism destination where we will see a holy place for Hindus located in south Bali with all the uniqueness and beauty of the sunset here making this place a very famous tourist destination among tourists. The unique thing about Uluwatu Temple is that it is located on a 70 meter high Batur coral cliff, around which there is a monkey habitat and very enchanting views of the ocean here. Uluwatu Temple was built by Empu Kuturan in 9th AD, was a Holy Priest from East Java, he came to Bali because of the urgency to teach dharma and religion, was very instrumental in uniting the sects in Bali. A small forest lies at the front and hundreds of monkeys live here. They are believed to guard the Uluwatu temple from bad influences, Enjoy the truly enchanting sunset view at Uluwatu Temple

A small forest lies at the front and hundreds of monkeys live here. They are believed to guard the Uluwatu temple from bad influences, Enjoy the truly enchanting sunset view at Uluwatu Temple

title.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance

image.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kecak and Fire Dance is a traditional Balinese dance entertainment performance presented in a small theater next to Uluwatu Temple, performed by local Balinese dancers professionally so that the performance is not boring. The Kecak dance takes the story from the Ramayana where the Goddess Sita was kidnapped by Ravana and Hanoman burned Ravana's palace, a mythological storyline that is very interesting to watch. The unique thing about this Kecak dance is that the sound of the music in the dance is performed by the dancers, where the dancers perform a cappella by saying the word "cak" in response to each other, so that it makes people who hear it very comfortable. kecak dance becomes one of the tourist destinations for the show that is very often watched and this show only starts in the afternoon

price.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour Price :
price.content:
Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of West Bali Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 700,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 850,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Full Day Ubud and Uluwatu Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Visit Ubud Monkey Forest
Visit Tegalalang Rice Terrace
Visit Kecak and Fire Dance

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
